name: Emotional Resilience Exercises
description: Building long-term resistance to emotional hijacking and strengthening self-regulation.

cards.title: The Power of Naming Emotions
cards.description: Breaking emotional overwhelm by identifying and labeling feelings in the moment.
cards.bulletpoints: Emotion Naming, Thought-Emotion Separation, Emotional Categorization

cards.title: Emotional Delay Tactics
cards.description: Creating space between emotional triggers and reactions.
cards.bulletpoints: 10-Second Pause, Mental Redirect, Conscious Emotional Delays

cards.title: Emotional Reset Anchors
cards.bulletpoints: Personal Symbolism, Memory Anchors, Emotional Reinforcement Techniques
